name: KeetKats Panic !
description:
- Pitch -

Defend your Keetcat farm from evil Fows. Feed them and train them to fight. Take care of their eggs to expand your pack.
But be careful, every 10 seconds the Fows will come back...

- Controls -

(plug your controller to play with your friends)

- Credits -
